iffs:creation_date.title: Creation Date
iffs:creation_date.description: Date of the creation of asset

iffs:asset_status.title: Asset Status
iffs:asset_status.description: State of the Asset in Fleet Manager

iffs:product_name.title: Product Name
iffs:product_name.description: Name of the asset from the manufacturer

iffs:product_icon.title: Product Icon
iffs:product_icon.description: The production icon of the asset

iffs:manufacturing_year.title: Year of manufacturing
iffs:manufacturing_year.description: The manufacturer year of the asset

iffs:documentation.title: Operating Manual
iffs:documentation.description: The legally required documentation for the machine

iffs:asset_communication_protocol.title: Communication Protocol
iffs:asset_communication_protocol.description: The communication protocol of the asset

iffs:height.title: Height
iffs:height.description: The height of the asset in millimeters

iffs:width.title: Width
iffs:width.description: the width of the asset in millimeters

iffs:length.title: Length
iffs:length.description: the length of the asset in millimeters

iffs:weigth.title: Weight
iffs:weigth.description: the length of the asset in kilograms

iffs:dustiness_max.title: Dust Density (max.)
iffs:dustiness_max.description: The max dust density in mg/m³

iffr:volumentric_flow_rate_hours.title: volumentric Flow Rate Hours
iffr:volumentric_flow_rate_hours.description: volumentric Flow Rate Hours of the machine

eclass:automation_interface_present.title: automation interface present
eclass:automation_interface_present.description: specification whether the device is equipped with an automation interface

eclass:water_cooling_present.title: water cooling present
eclass:water_cooling_present.description: specification whether a water cooling exists

eclass:length.title: length
eclass:length.description: for objects with orientation in preferred position during use the dimension perpendicular to diameter/height/width/depth

eclass:power_adjustment.title: power adjustment
eclass:power_adjustment.description: information about the possibility to adjust the electric initial effective power

eclass:water_cooling_retrofittable.title: water cooling retrofittable
eclass:water_cooling_retrofittable.description: specification whether water cooling can be retrofitted

eclass:height.title: height
eclass:height.description: for objects with orientation in preferred position during use the dimension perpendicular to diameter/length/width/depth

eclass:empty_weight.title: empty weight
eclass:empty_weight.description: mass of the object without add-on part and operating materials

eclass:fuse.title: fuse (time lag)
eclass:fuse.description: specification of the amperage of the overcurrent protection device. A fuse is action-delayed if the amperage can be over the maximum allowed value for a short time without reacting

eclass:width.title: width
eclass:width.description: for objects with orientation in preferred position during use the dimension perpendicular to height/ length/depth

eclass:address_link.title: address of additional link
eclass:address_link.description: web site address where information about the product or contact is given

eclass:brand.title: Brand
eclass:brand.description: Part of the naming for the support and the recognition of the brand position of products and services consisting of words, numbers, letters or other characters. Registered brands and trademarks are indicated with the appropriate protective signs (® or TM)

eclass:supplier_product_order_suffix.title: Supplier product order suffix
eclass:supplier_product_order_suffix.description: By the supplier awarded string for the identification of additional attributes, not by a structured supplier item number may be expressed

eclass:supplier_product_root.title: Supplier product root
eclass:supplier_product_root.description: Top level of a 3 level supplier specific product hierarchy

eclass:supplier_article_number.title: product article number of supplier
eclass:supplier_article_number.description: unique product order identifier of the supplier

eclass:supplier_product_designation.title: Supplier product designation
eclass:supplier_product_designation.description: Short description of the product (short text)

eclass:supplier_name.title: name of supplier
eclass:supplier_name.description: name of supplier which provides the customer with a product or a service

eclass:product_type.title: Product type
eclass:product_type.description: Characteristic to differentiate between different products of a product family or special variants

eclass:manufacturer_product_designation.title: Manufacturer product designation
eclass:manufacturer_product_designation.description: Short description of the product (short text)

eclass:gln_manufacturer.title: GLN of manufacturer
eclass:gln_manufacturer.description: internationally unique identification number for the manufacturer of the device or the product and for the physical location

eclass:uri_product.title: URI of the product
eclass:uri_product.description: unique global identification of the product using an universal resource identifier (URI)
